overview: Will (Elliot Finn) and Dean (Justin Matthews) are military reserve soldiers at an intensive two-day weekend refresher intended to keep their skills sharp while they're not on active duty. They don't know each other well, but over the course of the weekend they build casual rapport. Stolen glances and the tension between them doesn't go unnoticed by either man. More comfortable with his sexuality, Will leans into the interest--a stark contrast from Dean's palpable repression.
title: Don't Ask Don't Tell
